alert.note: Alert for Lower Columbia Basin of Oregon (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 11 at 2:56PM PST until January 14 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WATCH IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH SATURDAY MORNING... ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE FRIDAY NIGHT THROUGH LATE SATURDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Watch, dangerously cold wind chills possible. Wind chills as low as 15 below zero. For the Winter Storm Watch, heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches possible. * WHERE...Lower Columbia Basin of Oregon. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Watch, from Friday afternoon through Saturday morning. For the Winter Storm Watch, from late Friday night through late Saturday night. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
